Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory91.png'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Lee, the flanks!', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: "Son of a—they're all holed up in the corners!", 4: '3'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: "We're cut off by the explosion. The only way is forward!", 4: '3'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: 'Mapping route now... No... There are too many Corrupted ahead!', 4: '2'}
{2: '???', 3: '——WARNING, WARNING——'}
{2: '???', 3: '——Foreign object detected: Automated cleaning program will begin in 5 minutes——'}
{2: '???', 3: '——Workers should refrain from entering the conveyor sections to avoid potential injuries——'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'What was that?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: "I can't be sure, but it sounds like something is coming in 5 minutes!", 4: '2'}
{2: '???', 3: '——WARNING, WARNING——'}
{2: '???', 3: '——Automated cleaning program is now commencing——'}
{2: '???', 3: '——All workers should evacuate from the area: This is not a drill——'}
{3: 'A massive crane zooms past you and the others. Luckily, you all duck just in time.'}
{3: 'The Corrupted, however, were not so lucky. The crane knocks them all over.'}
{3: 'With the Corrupted all immobilized from the impact, you quickly withdraw from the area. Some of their broken limbs splinter from your hurried sprint.', 6: '1'}
{2: '???', 3: '——Foreign objects stabilized: Commencing annihilative purge program——', 6: '1'}
{3: 'The high acidity reagent and pressurized freezing reagent take turns mowing down the already crushed Corrupted, until all that was left was corroded, flash-frozen slag.'}
{3: 'And finally, a final discharge of pressurized water sends the Corrupted to their final respite—the sea.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: "Whole sets of cranes, conveyor belt routing, and a cooling function... That's the full course. Looks like the logistic systems are still online.", 4: '3'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: 'The central AI must have repurposed the freight systems to deal with the Corrupted nearby...', 4: '3'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'That must be why we see so few Corrupted the closer we get to the center.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Normal Corrupted would never survive this.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: 'Yep, that should be the case.', 4: '3'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: "Let's try to head to the purification filter now that most of the Corrupted are gone.", 4: '3'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: "If the sensors aren't lying, then the CPF should be near the center of the hub.", 4: '3'}
